title: Iskra Lawrence, 29, shows off her gorgeous curves in a sizzling Instagram video
text:
She's known for promoting body confidence.

And Iskra Lawrence showcased her sizzling curves in a fun video she shared with her 4.5million followers via Instagram on Thursday.

The model, 29, oozed confidence as she filmed herself getting ready for the day, putting on several layers of pink and grey clothing.

Beauty: Iskra Lawrence showcased her sizzling curves in a fun video she shared with her 4.5million followers via Instagram on Thursday

Iskra started the short clip by posing in her blush coloured bra and maroon leggings, with her long blonde hair tied back in a bun.

She playfully moved towards the camera, tipping her shoulders forward and showing off her ample assets.

The beauty then span around, clicking her fingers to jump to when she had added some pretty gold necklaces to her ensemble.

Iskra then added a thin long-sleeved top and a pale pink roll neck jumper, both from Aerie.

Peachy: The model, 29, oozed confidence as she filmed herself getting ready for the day, putting on several layers of pink and grey clothing

Stunning: Iskra started the short clip by posing in her blush coloured bra and maroon leggings, with her long blonde hair tied back in a bun

Fashion: Iskra oozed confidence as she moved around and clicked her fingers for the camera

Making the outfit a little smarter, Iskra added a checked grey blazer from Madewell and completed the look with a tan Rebecca Minkoff bag.

Iskra captioned her sizzling video 'made this lil video for you as I was getting ready to go out' and listed all of the clothes she was wearing.

The British model looked radiant as she received an honorary gold medal from Trinity College Dublin's University Philosophical Society last week.

Iskra was invited by the university society to speak on her career in the fashion industry as well as breaking the mold as a body-confident model.

The beauty's body positive outlook has won her legions of fans and she currently boasts 4.5million followers on Instagram.

Layering up: Iskra added a long sleeved pale pink top to her look before stepping out

Looking good: For her next layer Iskra added a pink roll neck jumper which contrasted with her darker leggings and lipstick shade

Her outing comes after Glamour named her as one of the new 'shakers' in the modelling industry alongside Alessandra Garcia-Lorido, Yvonne Simone, Solange van Doorn and Seynabou Cissé.

Speaking to the publication, the American Eagle Outfitters model regretted that plus-size women were often more further sexualised than others.

She also expressed that body positivity campaigns still tended to cater to the smaller end of the plus-size spectrum.

'I can’t promise you that you’re [always] going to feel represented...So I want people to know if you can’t see yourself, you can still be it, you can still do it,' she said

Iskra was born in Worcestershire, UK, and was accepted into the National Youth Theatre at the young age of 15, she was also a competitive swimmer on the national level at the same age.
